text: Niscaya yara allahâ€Œra sathe kara pratisruti ebam nijedera sapathera binimaye tuccha mulya kharida kare, akherate tadera kono ansa ne'i [1]. Ara allahâ€Œ tadera sathe katha balabena na ebam tadera dike takabena na keyamatera dina. Ara taderake parisud'dha'o karabena na; ebam tadera jan'ya rayeche marmantuda sasti
